name: Quick Draw (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

This is a shooting game for 1 or 2 players. Each player has a cowboy with a gun, you must shoot your partner before he shoots you. The first to reach 5 wins. Use the Cacti and passing wagon for cover. Each players score is displayed at the top of the screen. Control your cowboy with the following keys:

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Z
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: Z

Start the game: A
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: A

 

Quick Draw - Solar Software
